sentences.sContent: Tickets are limited and will be allocated to those who apply first.
sentences.sCn: 票数有限，将分配给那些先申请的人。

remMethod.val: al(表加强) ＋ loc(地方) ＋ ate(做) → 不断把东西发送到各地 → 分配， 分派

trans.tranCn: 分配， 分派， 把…拨给
trans.tranOther: to use something for a particular purpose, give something to a particular person etc, especially after an official decision has been made
